## Quaternion.slerp() method

Spherically interpolates between the current quaternion and another quaternion.

**Signature:**

```typescript
slerp(quaternion: Quaternion, t: number): Quaternion;
```

</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

The quaternion to interpolate with.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

t


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The interpolation factor.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Quaternion](./server.quaternion.md)

The current quaternion.
